abstract: Boston Red Sox president for baseball operations Dave Dombrowski says outfielder Hanley Ramirez will play first base in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Dave Dombrowski, Boston’s president for baseball operations, said Ramirez will move from the outfield to first base after he transitioned from shortstop to the outfield.

headline.main: Red Sox to Shift Hanley Ramirez

snippet: Dave Dombrowski, Boston’s president for baseball operations, said Ramirez will move from the outfield to first base after he transitioned from shortstop to the outfield.
